players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today to protect the town."
You: "Everyone, don't listen to Charlie. He's probably the mafioso trying to frame me. Why reveal an investigation so fast? It smells fishy!"
Charlie: "Trust my investigation; Alice is the mafioso. Bob, join me in voting her out to end this threat."
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why rush? You're the mafioso trying to frame me. Bob, vote for Charlie with me!"

Alice: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. If you're the detective, why rush? You're the mafioso trying to frame me. Bob, vote for Charlie with me!"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
